name: Anterix Inc.
description: Anterix Inc. is a leading provider of private broadband connectivity solutions and a pioneer in the utilization of the 900 MHz spectrum for critical infrastructure and enterprise applications. Founded in 2011 and headquartered in Bedminster, New Jersey, Anterix focuses on delivering reliable, secure, and high-performance wireless communications for utilities, transportation, and other industrial sectors. The company aims to enable its customers to harness the power of the Internet of Things (IoT), enhancing operational efficiency and safety through advanced connectivity solutions. Anterix’s proprietary technology allows for the deployment of private LTE networks, offering a robust platform for mission-critical communications and data transmission. The company partners with industry leaders to facilitate the transformation of energy and utility sectors, driving innovation in smart grid technology and resource management. With a commitment to supporting the digital transformation of essential services, Anterix is positioned to play a critical role in the evolution of infrastructure connectivity in North America.
